# load libraries -------------------------------------

library(gapminder)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(googlesheets4)

waste_streams_zh_summary <- read_csv(file = "/cloud/project/data/processed/waste-streams_zh_processed.csv")

# Tables
## Mean weight per waste category

| label: tbl-waste_cat-mean
| tbl-cap: "Mean values per waste category"

waste_streams_zh_meanwaste <- waste_streams_zh_summary %>%
  group_by(waste_category) %>%
  summarise(mean = mean(weight),
            n = n())

# results display as table
waste_streams_zh_meanwaste %>%
  knitr::kable(digits = 0)

# save data underlying the table

write_csv(waste_streams_zh_meanwaste, "/cloud/project/data/final/2024-04-11-waste-streams_zh_meanwaste.csv")
